comprehensive_overview: nvtop is an NVIDIA GPU system monitoring tool with a user-friendly CLI interface. It provides real-time monitoring of GPU utilization, memory usage, temperature, power consumption, and other important metrics.
core_features: Real-time monitoring of NVIDIA GPU metrics
Display of GPU utilization, memory usage, temperature, power consumption, and more
Support for multiple GPUs on a single system
Color-coded display for easy visualization of GPU performance
